name: Pixelmon War
description:
Welcome to the Pixelmon Fantasy Island! Here you can build synergies with many Pixelmon and explore the treasures of the island together!
[Fantasy Forest] There is a forest kingdom in the southwest where a large number of wood-type and earth-type Pixelmons are living in. If you are lucky, you’ll meet the legendary forest-type Pixelmons!
[Fantasy Mountains] Walking through the forest kingdom, you will see the Fantasy Mountains in the clouds. The upper part of mountains is covered with snow all the year round, but the foot is always green. If you strive to climb on the top of the mountain, you’ll see a huge active volcano.
[Fantasy River] In the mid of the island flows the clearest and most vigorous river in this world. Rumors that Pixelmons who insist on bathing in the river daily will get their evolution speed significantly increased!
[Pixelmon King Contest] Different Fairymon tribes don’t attack each other in normal times, but for every three years, a contest will be held on the island between Pixelmons from different tribes. The champion of the contest will be the new Pixelmon king!
[Island Treasure] The legendary treasures hidden on the Fantasy Island have always been luring people to explore them. However, no one was seen to return triumphantly.
